label: A3BC_mC10_8_ab_a_a-001
title: Monoclinic PZT [Pb(Zr$_{x}$Ti$_{1-x}$)O$_{3}$] Structure
comments: This is a monoclinic ferroelectric distortion of \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_cP5_221_a_c_b-001}{the cubic perovskite structure, $E2_{1}$}. In Pb(Zr$_{x}$Ti$_{1-x}$)O$_{3}$ (aka PZT) it is found only when ${x=0.52}$. Although the second (2a) site is nearly equally occupied by zirconium and titanium atoms, the pictures use Zr atoms. Compare this to the \href{current_web_home_dir/A3BC_tP5_99_ac_b_a-002}{tetragonal PZT structure}.
